objects.text: • 2 Adorable Cats • Spinning Palm Tree • Fun Accessories

product_details.description: Welcome to your Barbie World. Build your best Barbie life! Pounce into pet paradise with this kitty tower playset. Designed with a spinning palm tree, adjustable leaf bed, and relaxing hammock  there are so many pawesome ways for the two pet kitties to play. Also included is a bag of cat food, bowls, and toys. Doll sold separately. Colors and decorations may vary.

banner_details:
This playful and vibrant banner is designed to promote a children's toy set using colorful and engaging graphics. The central element is a toy image (`product_image`) placed inside a large circular frame. At the top, an eye-catching main title (`heading`) in bold red font draws attention, followed by a complementary subtitle (`subheading`) in dark blue. A price tag (`price`) displayed in a blue circle emphasizes affordability. Key product features are listed in a clean font (`description`) at the bottom. A bold red button (`cta`) acts as the primary call-to-action, urging immediate purchase. Decorative pastel circles, lines, and swooshes add a whimsical, energetic touch.

**Color Palette:**
- Red: #d2010d (headings, CTA)
- Blue: #1a0dab (subtitle and accents)
- Light Blue Gradient: #A7D1FF to #83BEFF (price background)
- Pink Gradient: #FFD6E7 to #FFA6C9 (background accents)
- Neutral Gray: #f3f3f3 (overall background)
- White: #ffffff (text contrast and background)
product_color: The product image showcases a vibrant and playful color palette geared toward children. Dominant hues include bubblegum pink (#F74FA4) seen in the cat house, and mint green (#4CC88E) used for the grass-like top and leafy elements. Brown tones (#945634) color the tree trunk and a kitten, while pale peach (#FCD4A4) makes up the base and support columns. Accents like lavender purple (#B484E9), sky blue (#66C6DF), and red-pink (#EF4B6C) enhance visual appeal. The colors are strategically balanced—bright and pastel tones contrast harmoniously. Bold colors highlight interactive features, while gentle colors maintain a fun, inviting look ideal for an advertisement banner.
